title: Seared plaice fillets with warm butterbeans, lemon, chilli and herbs
description: Seared plaice served on softened butter beans, lightly spiced and fresh with the flavours of lemon, thyme and mint.
ingredients: 175g/6oz dried butter beans, soaked overnight in cold water (alternatively 1x 200g tin of cooked butter beans)
drizzle of extra virgin olive oil (optional)
salt and freshly ground black pepper
